title: Simpsons Roasting on an Open Fire
summary: "Simpsons Roasting on an Open Fire", titled onscreen as "The Simpsons Christmas Special",[1][3] is the series premiere and first episode of the American animated television series The Simpsons. The television special, "The Simpsons Christmas Special" originally aired on December 17, 1989. Commercials for the next episode ("Bart the Genius") ran during breaks for this episode.
